casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marcus Reymond ROBINSON. No. 411A94-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 8, 2016. Robert T. Thompson, Assistant District Attorney, for State of NC. G. Robert Hicks, III, Assistant District Attorney. Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., for Robinson, Marcus Reymond. Jay H. Ferguson, Durham, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond. James E. Ferguson, II, Charlotte, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond. Cassandra Stubbs, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond. William P. Hart, Sr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General. D. Clark Smith, Jr., Greensboro, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond. Donald H. Beskind, Raleigh, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond. Edward Joseph Blocher, Jr., for Social Scientists. Cynthia F. Adcock, for Murder Victims' Families for Reconciliation of NC. Janet Moore, for N.C. Citizens Excluded from Jury Service Based on Race. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Narendra K. Ghosh, Chapel Hill, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Jeffrey Gerrish, for Former Senior U.S. Military Officials. James P. Cooney, III, Charlotte, for Former Senior U.S. Military Officials. John R. Mills, for Experts in Law and Implicit Bias. Gregory B. Craig, for Former Senior U.S. Military Officials. Alex T. Haskell, for Former Senior U.S. Military Officials. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Kenneth J. Rose, Durham, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of January 2016 by Defendant for Clarification: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of January 2016." ERVIN, J., recused.
